alert.note: Alert for Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:32PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern York, central Rockingham and southeastern Strafford Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 532 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Epping, or 7 miles west of Durham, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Portsmouth, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Sanford, Northwood, Dover, Somersworth, Barrington, Berwick, Epping, Lebanon, Brentwood, Greenland, South Berwick, York, Newington, Stratham and Newmarket. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 10 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
